title: Beating - find f-beat given speed and wavelengths

content.question: Two sound waves are traveling through a medium for which the speed of sound is <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>. One wave has a wavelength <math alttext="lambda sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></math> and the other wave has a wavelength <math alttext="lambda sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></math>. What is the beat frequency resulting from the interference of the two sound waves?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction v over lambda sub A, end sub, plus lambda sub B, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mrow><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction v over the absolute value of lambda sub A, end sub, minus lambda sub B, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over lambda sub A, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over lambda sub B, close parenthesis, times v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of the fraction 1 over lambda sub A, end fraction, minus the fraction 1 over lambda sub B, end fraction, end absolute value, times v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of the fraction 1 over lambda sub A, end fraction, minus the fraction 1 over lambda sub B, end fraction, end absolute value, times v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>λ</mi><mi>B</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
